title: T20 International cricket
articleDescription: Australia vs India on Friday 31 October 2025 at the MCG
articleContent:
T20 International cricket returns to the MCG on October 31 when Australia takes on India in the second match of a five-match series.

The match will begin at 7.15pm.

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey Planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey. 

If you use Journey Planner within 14 days of this event, you'll see all the extra services we've added to help you get there.

Metropolitan train

Metro Trains Additional services

Additional services for the following lines depart after the match:

  • Mernda, Epping, Greenborough, MacLeod, Flinders Steet, Ringwood, Glen Waverley, Dandenong, Frankston, Sandringham, Werribee, Newport, Craigieburn and Sunbury passengers.

Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from the MCG

Route 48

  • Trams will operate as a shuttle between Wellington Parade/Simpson Street Stop 13 and Collins Street/Victoria Harbour Stop D18

Route 70a

  • Trams will operate as a shuttle between Flinders Street West Stop 06, and MCG/John Cain Arena stop 7C.

Route 75a

  • Trams will operate as a shuttle between Flinders Street Stop 04 and Wellington Parade/Simpson Street Stop 13.

Metropolitan bus

Customers can catch the following buses close to the MCG:

  • Route 246

Please note, services may terminate prior to the end of the match.

Regional train

  • Normal services departing from Southern Cross Station

Additional information

  • Download our free mobile apps for Android and iOS to get public transport information on the go. You can also top up your myki instantly in the app.
  • If you need accessibility information and assistance, see Accessibility.
  • Top up your myki before travelling or set Auto Top Up so you never need to top up again. For more information, see Auto Top Up.
  • Mobile myki is a new way to travel with myki. It’s a digital myki on your Android phone on the Google Wallet™ app.
  • For information about tickets for children and concessions, see Children and Concessions.
  • If you need more information or special assistance, please call 1800 800 007 before travelling.
